alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:47AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Walker and north central Jefferson Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 247 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cordova, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Adamsville, Parrish, Sipsey, West Jefferson, Rocky Hollow, Burnwell, Beloit, Quinton, Lynns Park, Sayre, Barney, Empire, Miller Steam Plant, Boldo and Partridge Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
